text: is a Japanese cross-country skier. She competed in two events at the 2006 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese female cross-country skiers Category:Olympic cross-country skiers of Japan Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2006 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Yamagata Prefecture Category:Asian Games medalists in cross-country skiing Category:Cross-country skiers at the 2003 Asian Winter Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 2003 Asian Winter Games
title: Chizuru Soneta
